title: Do the codicils have any visible damages or marks?
question: Do the codicils have any visible damages or marks?

codicilsHasVisibleDamage.required: Select ‘yes’ if you know if the codicils have any visible damages or marks

codicilsDamageTypes.required: Select which visible damages or marks applies

otherDamageDescription.required: Enter a description of the visible damages or marks to the codicils
